sources.title: 4. Sources of Personal Data
sources.content: Personal data is primarily collected directly from the data subject, for example through the contact form or email. Data may also be collected from public sources in the course of business.

disclosure.title: 5. Data Disclosure and Transfer
disclosure.content: We do not disclose personal data to third parties for marketing purposes. Data may be disclosed to authorities to fulfil statutory obligations. We use service providers (e.g. cloud services) with whom we have entered into appropriate data processing agreements.

retention.title: 6. Data Retention Period
retention.content: We retain personal data only as long as necessary to fulfil the purposes described in this policy or to comply with statutory obligations.

rights.title: 7. Data Subject Rights
rights.description: Data subjects have the following rights:
items: Right of access to their data
rights.footer: You can exercise your rights by contacting us at viestinta@antesto.fi.

security.title: 8. Data Security
security.content: We protect personal data with appropriate technical and organisational measures. Access to data is restricted to those who need it for their job duties.
